name: asperheader
description: This is an extension that will allow the developers of the Asperguide project to sign their file in an easier way and quicker

commands.title: AsperHeader: Hello World with File Info
AsperHeader: Display a random ascii logo in it's own file
AsperHeader: Add a header to the file
AsperHeader: Refresh the header located in the file that you asked to trigger, this also gets triggered with the save

asperheader.extensionName.description: The name of the extension. Appears in generated headers as the source tool.

asperheader.projectCopyright.description: The copyright line that will be inserted into generated headers.

asperheader.headerOpenerDecorationOpen.description: The opening marker used at the start of the header border.

asperheader.headerOpenerDecorationClose.description: The closing marker used at the end of the header border.

asperheader.headerCommentSpacing.description: The spacing between the comment character(s) and the rest of the header content.

asperheader.telegraphBegin.description: The keyword used to mark the start of a header block.

asperheader.telegraphEnd.description: The keyword used to mark the end of a header block.

asperheader.telegraphBlockStop.description: Marker used to end multiline sections (e.g. DESCRIPTION, REQUIREMENTS).

asperheader.telegraphEndOfTransmission.description: End-of-transmission marker. Appears just before the closing header border.

asperheader.headerAddBlankLineAfterMulti.description: If true, inserts a blank line after each multiline section (DESCRIPTION, REQUIREMENTS, etc.).

asperheader.headerKeyDefinitionSeparator.description: The separator string used between keys (like FILE, PROJECT) and their values.

asperheader.headerLogoKey.description: The keyword used to identify the logo block in the header.

asperheader.headerProjectKey.description: The keyword used for the project name field.

asperheader.headerFileKey.description: The keyword used for the file name field.

asperheader.headerCreationDateKey.description: The keyword used for the file creation date field.

asperheader.headerLastModifiedKey.description: The keyword used for the last modified timestamp field.

asperheader.headerDescriptionKey.description: The keyword used for the description field.

asperheader.headerCopyrightKey.description: The keyword used for the copyright field.

asperheader.headerTagKey.description: The keyword used for the tags/keywords field.

asperheader.headerPurposeKey.description: The keyword used for the purpose field.

asperheader.headerTimeSeperatorHour.description: The separator between hours and minutes in time values.

asperheader.headerTimeSeperatorMinute.description: The separator between minutes and seconds in time values.

asperheader.headerTimeSeperatorSecond.description: The separator placed after seconds in time values. Leave empty for none.

asperheader.headerTimeAndDateSeperator.description: The separator string between the time and date values.

asperheader.headerDateSeperatorDay.description: The separator between the day and month in date values.

asperheader.headerDateSeperatorMonth.description: The separator between the month and year in date values.

asperheader.headerDateSeperatorYear.description: Optional suffix after the year in date values. Leave empty for none.

asperheader.headerLogo.description: The default ASCII logo used when random logos are disabled.

asperheader.maxScanLength.description: The maximum number of lines to scan in a file when checking for an existing header.

asperheader.enableDebug.description: Enable or disable debug logging for the extension.

asperheader.refreshOnSave.description: If true, the header will automatically refresh (update last modified date, etc.) whenever the file is saved.

asperheader.promptToCreateIfMissing.description: If true, prompts the user to create a header if none is found when saving a file.

asperheader.randomLogo.description: If true, a random ASCII logo will be chosen from the logo bank for each generated header.

asperheader.extensionIgnore.description: A list of file globs or extensions where the header injection should not run on save.

asperheader.useWorkspaceNameWhenAvailabl.description: If true, the name of the active workspace will be used as the displayed project name.

asperheader.projectDescription.description: If set, will bypass the description prompt/question and fill it with the description provided here.
